attributes.action: Remove all armed forces from the middle east
attributes.additional_details: We are the beacon of light not darkness. It’s time to change our ways for the good of the world
attributes.background: Remove all support and armed forces from the middle easy. Children in Yemen are starving. This is mass Genocide.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for all the the armed forces in the Middle East. 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326822
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326932
